title: SQL Injection Login Bypass
description: Exploit a SQL Injection vulnerability to bypass login authentication.
hints: Check the SQL query structure in the source code.
Try to bypass the authentication using common SQL Injection techniques.
Use payloads like ' OR '1'='1' to manipulate the query results.
learningObjectives: Understand the basic concepts of SQL Injection.
Learn how SQL Injection vulnerabilities occur due to improper input validation.
Practice crafting payloads to exploit SQL Injection.
